document.full_text: christopher tierney, who fell 30 feet off a platform while performing in december in broadway's "spider-man: turn off the dark," is back in the show.
document.title: flying in 'spider-man' again after fall
lines_and_colors: christopher tierney, who fell 30 feet off a platform while performing in december in broadway's "spider-man: turn off the dark," is back in the show.
